summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 between FBI personnel and a paralegal specialist regarding technical issues loading images from a forensic drive (NYC024383) related to an investigation. The emails discuss coordinating access to the case files to verify viewable images.

connections.description: M directs the email recipient to He for assistance with accessing case files at CART, indicating a working relationship.

events.title: Report of image loading issues on forensic drive
events.description: A paralegal specialist reports technical problems viewing images on forensic drive NYC024383, noting images either don't load or are obscured by color blocks.

events.title: Coordination to resolve image access
events.description: FBI examiners coordinate to provide access to the case files on a machine to verify the viewability of images from the forensic drive.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain concerning technical difficulties accessing images from a forensic drive labeled NYC024383, which is part of an investigation.
FBI personnel, including a NY CART Coordinator Senior Forensic Examiner, are involved in troubleshooting the image loading issue.
The emails indicate an ongoing review of digital evidence, with concerns about potentially missing responsive items due to technical problems.
